text: Bizir manam nɨ uan navir averiamɨn an opari, bizir kamnaghra, an otogham. Gumazitam uan navir ghurimɨn arazibar gɨn mangɨtɨma, an navir ghurir kamɨn dagher kuraba otivtɨma a bar kuvigham. Egh gumazitam Godɨn Duamɨn gɨn mangɨtɨ, Godɨn Duam a damutɨ, dagher aghuiba otivtɨma, a ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuir zurara itim iniam. Egh ia suam, ia God gifari, bar puvatɨ. Ia uarira uarigh ifari, egh ia kamaghɨn damuan markɨ.
